title: Greetings! üëã Welcome to my homepage.
text:
PhD Student
Aalto University, Finland
üìç Espoo, Finland
üìß gen.li@aalto.fi
üåê Aalto Homepage







I am a PhD researcher in Chemical Engineering at Aalto University, Finland.
My research focuses on biomass valorisation, Ni-based catalysis, and computational modeling.
I combine experimental and theoretical approaches to design efficient catalytic systems for lignin upgrading and sustainable chemical production.





Lignin solvolysis & hydrodeoxygenation (HDO)
Ni‚ÇÇP and non-noble metal catalysis
DFT, AIMD, and enhanced sampling (metadynamics, OPES)
Molecular modeling of lignin dissolution
Renewable fuels and platform chemicals
